house_listing.house_description: This 3+ level detached single family home built in 1969 has 5 bedroom(s), 5 full bath(s)/3 half bath(s) , 2 car garage and approximately 9000 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room, living room, bonus room, master bedroom. Features include fireplace, air conditioning, french doors.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Bonus Room, Dining Room, Family Room, Living Room, Master

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, French Doors, Wet Bar
